boardgame.name: Rialto
boardgame.description: In the card-driven board game Rialto, the goal is to earn the most victory points (VPs), which are awarded for a variety of things. The game board displays the six districts of Venice, and players earn VPs for placing council members into these, for building bridges and placing gondolas to connect the districts with one another, and for building advantageous buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is played over six rounds, with each round consisting of three phases:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1. Acquire cards: Each player takes a set of cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2. Play cards: Players use cards to perform certain actions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3. Activate buildings: Players may take advantage of their buildings and use their powers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In phase 1, sets of eight cards are displayed (with six cards face-up and two face-down). Each player takes one set, then reduces his hand to seven cards. A card shows one of six specific characters (Architect, Merchant, etc.) or is a wild card._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Phase 2 consists of six sub-phases in a fixed order, one for each character. In each sub-phase, players choose whether or not to play one or more cards of that specific character. Each card allows them to perfom that character's action, for example:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take one piece of gold for each Merchant card you play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Place one council member into the current district for each Council card you play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Take a building with a value equal to or lower than the number of Architect cards played. The higher its value, the better its function._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Whoever plays the most cards in each such sub-phase receives a bonus of one free action of that type. In case of a tie, whoever is farthest along the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Doge_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; bar gets the bonus _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and of course to advance on the Doge bar, players need to play Doge cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Finally, in phase 3, players may take advantage of their buildings. For each piece of gold paid, a player may use one of his building's ability._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players collect VPs both during the game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; from special buildings and by building bridges between districts _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and at the end of it _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; for majorities of council members in each district. The value of each district evolves during the game: Each district is adjacent to four other ones, and at the end of the game, they will be connected either via bridges or gondolas. A bridge increases the value of the adjacent districts by 3-6 victory points, whereas a gondola increases this value by 1 point. The player with the most council members in a district earns VPs equal to the district's total value, the player with the secondmost council members earns half this value, and so on. While it's important to establish majorities in the districts, it's also crucial to control their values by cleverly placing those bridges and gondolas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2004) Rialto Venice is a beautiful city... And your buildings make it that way! Rialto is a card-driven board game played over 6 rounds, one for each district of Venice. Players will acquire and play cards, then activate the special abilities of their buildings Players will collect victory points from: Special Buildings, Building Bridges, and Political Dominance of Districts. While dominating districts is important, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s also crucial to control their values by cleverly placing bridges and gondolas.

Tasty Minstrel Games (TTT2004) Rialto Venice is a beautiful city... And your buildings make it that way! Rialto is a card-driven board game played over 6 rounds, one for each district of Venice. Players will acquire and play cards, then activate the special abilities of their buildings Players will collect victory points from: Special Buildings, Building Bridges, and Political Dominance of Districts. While dominating districts is important, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s also crucial to control their values by cleverly placing bridges and gondolas.
